name: Multi Calculator - All-in-one Calculator free
description: Looking for a free calculator that can serve multiple calculator functions? This Prime Multi-Calculator App is a single app that not only does standard calculator functions but also helps you with other calculations and conversions. Make your life easier with this all-in-one calculator app, free multi calculator app that does multiple functions without installing multiple calculator or converter apps.  ***************************** APP FEATURES ***************************** This free multi calculator app is unique and is an all-in-one calculator app for the below calculator functions -  Standard Calculator with addition, subtraction, division, multiplication  GST Calculator with CGST, SGST calculation support  EMI Calculator - Home Loan EMI Calculator, Personal Loan EMI Calculator, Car Loan EMI Calculator, etc.  Currency Converter - Convert between 50+ currencies support with live currency rates & conversion.  BMI Calculator - Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) easily  Percentage Calculator - Super easy to use percentage calculator  Unit Converter - Easy unit converter for weight, length, area, time & volume All these features on the Calculator app are free to use. So, what are you waiting for? If you are looking for the best and pocket-friendly calculator app to replace the multiple calculator apps on your Android phone, start using this Prime Multi-Calculator app now.  ************************ SAY HELLO ************************ We are constantly working hard on making the Prime Multi-Calculator app better and more useful for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hi. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the Prime Multi-Calculator app, do not forget to rate us on the play store and share among your friends.
